ygData.subject: Digest Number 29
ygData.msgSnippet: I have killed high elf paladins in Innothule swamp (level 15-18) and I have never gotten an increase in faction with the Indigo Brotherhood. In Rathe Mountains
ygData.messageBody:
I have killed high elf paladins in Innothule swamp (level 15-18) and I have
never gotten an increase in faction with the Indigo Brotherhood. In Rathe
Mountains north of the entrance from the ferroot, there is a wood elf (may
be high but think wood) guard who is level 19-21. There are NPC's in the
area who will call him when they see an ogre, but not sure if they will
come if you attack him.

Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~ CT



Message text written by INTERNET:warriors_eq@onelist.com
>
The ONLY way to raise Indigo brotherhood faction is to kill elves. The
only
realistic targets (since Wood Elf guards are very high level) are the elves
on the Island of Erollsi. If you raise Indigo you lower Wood/High elf and
vice a versa. These two sides are mutually exclusive.
<
